name: Rise Above (kangarogames)
description:
2D Platformer game Rise Above, made by Kangaroo Games.

Demo is made with Michigan State University, after that I added:

3 Unique levels
New game mechanics includes using enemies
Added puzzle dynamics to the game

If you cant see the game properly, use Full Screen button at right end corner
Hope you enjoy it.
Credist: Kangaroo Games
